subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Justin Hicks scurried around Torrey Pines Golf Course on Friday, his 15 minutes of fame slipping away as he desperately tried to stay off the clock.
snippet: Justin Hicks scurried around Torrey Pines Golf Course on Friday, his 15 minutes of fame slipping away as he desperately tried to stay off the clock.
